channel.title: Hello, I am Valeriu from PayPro Global
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am glad I have found this community and I hope I will eventually become a valuable contributor here.
My name is Valeriu and I work as Community Manager for [PayPro Global][1], we provide tools and services to sell software, SaaS and Cloud products online.
I write content about digital eCommerce. You can check out my blog.
Also maybe you might be interested in one of my white papers.
I am based in Berlin and I often attend Business of Software events around my area and not only.
I look forward to getting to know you all and share insights on the industry with you.
Cheers,
Valeriu
[1]: http://www.payproglobal.com
